name: Havoc Your Way - The Chaos Years
blurb: Havoc, mayhem and mischief... Choose your own adventure! A new take on classics such as Skool Daze, Spy vs Spy and many more.

rewards.reward: DO GOODER\r\n==============================\r\nA big thanks from us for helping this game come to life.

ANGEL (Early Bird)
==============================
Receive a digital copy of the game, PC or Mac before general release! 
==============================
Also receive a Havoc Your Way PDF T-Shirt design.

SWOT
==============================
Receive a digital copy of the game and a bonus level of Brian’s house. Let the havoc commence at home!
==============================
-- Plus receive a Havoc Your Way PDF T-Shirt design --

PRANKSTER
==============================
Submit your top two pranks or acts of mischief. You will receive a credit in the game if one or both are accepted.
==============================
-- Receive a digital copy of the game, including bonus level. Plus receive a Havoc Your Way PDF T-Shirt design --

BOY SCOUT
==============================
 Receive a special edition digital copy of the game with added gameplay!
==============================
-- Submit your top two pranks or mischief. Plus receive a Havoc Your Way PDF T-Shirt design  --

HOOLIGAN
==============================
 Get access to the beta version and give us plenty of feedback, ideas and bug reports.
==============================
-- Receive a special edition digital copy of the game, including bonus level. Submit your top two pranks or mischief. Plus receive a Havoc Your Way PDF T-Shirt design  --

DEFENDER
==============================
 You get to name a character in the retirement home! ==============================
Also receive a PDF T-Shirt design of your character and name!
==============================
-- Receive a special edition digital copy of the game, including bonus level. Submit your top two pranks or mischief  --

==============================
